methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
This constructor will create a text field from an single AttributedString.  The string will 
 be word wrapped.

params.name: startX
params.comment: the x position to draw the string

params.name: width
params.comment: the max width allocated to this field

params.name: maxLines
params.comment: the max number of lines to display

methods.name: dataToScreenLocation
methods.comment: Finds the corresponding row, column for string index, and offset
